item.title: Cloudify Manager
item.description: Cloudify enables you to deploy applications using two main methods: Using the CLI only Using Cloudify Manager Cloudify Manager is a dedicated environment comprising an open-source stack which enables you to: Utilize plugins (such as Docker, Script, Chef and Puppet plugins) to manage application hosts Keep a directory of your blueprints Create multiple deployments for each blueprint and install them Execute healing, scaling and other custom workflows on your installed applications Run multiple workflows concurrently View an application’s topology and perform different tasks using the Cloudify Web UI View metrics Search logs In addition, Cloudify Manager:
